abstract: The Chinese oil giant PetroChina would ”welcome” closer ties with BP as the company continues to grapple with the massive oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: The Chinese oil giant PetroChina would ”welcome” closer ties with BP as the company continues to grapple with the massive oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese oil giant PetroChina would “welcome” closer ties with BP as the company continues to grapple with the massive oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: PetroChina Open to Improved Ties with BP
